full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Supplier Solicitation Number: WS3760974017

#### Tender Details
- **Title**: Self-propelled Walk Behind Trenching Machine with Trailer
- **Publication Date**: December 6, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 23, 2022 at 14:00 EST

#### Project Overview

The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites bidders to supply and deliver a self-propelled walk behind trenching machine with trailer to the Canadian Maneuver Training Center (CMTC) Wainwright G6 Section located at Denwood, Alberta.

The successful bidder will be required to provide a trenching machine capable of burying telecommunications lines in areas where overhead crossings are not practical. The machine will be used by the CMTC G6 section during Exercise Maple Resolve.

#### Tender Information

- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Attachment and Contact Information

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Dino Cavalic (SPAC/PSPC), [dino.cavalic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dino.cavalic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Note

Please disregard the response deadline posted in Ariba Discovery. All bidders must submit their bids, along with all required supporting documentation, by 14:00 EST on December 23, 2022. Any bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

The bidder is responsible for reviewing the [tender notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14798230?extsite=MTQ3OTgyMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for detailed information about the project and the tender process.  ANSWER 
```
